alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Grundy; Van Buren; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coffee, southwestern Van Buren, southern Warren and Grundy Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of McMinnville, moving east at 10 mph. A few other strong thunderstorms were in the area as well. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Gruetli-Laager, Tracy City, Monteagle, Altamont, Coalmont, Morrison, Palmer, Beersheba Springs, Viola, Summitville, Hillsboro, Pelham and Fiery Gizzard State Park. This includes Interstate 24 near mile marker 134. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
